mapper.select: SELECT job_record.*, user._name as operate_user_name, job_record_resource_mapping.resource_id, resource.resource_name, resource.resource_type, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.id,NULL) as workspace_id, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.NAME,NULL) as workspace_name, org_workspace.organization_id, org_workspace.organization_name FROM job_record INNER JOIN job_record_resource_mapping ON job_record.id = job_record_resource_mapping.job_record_id LEFT JOIN user on job_record.operate_user_id = user.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, source_id,instance_name as resource_name,'VM' as resource_type FROM vm_cloud_server UNION ALL SELECT id, source_id,disk_name as resource_name,'DISK' as resource_type FROM vm_cloud_disk ) resource ON resource_id = resource.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace ON resource.source_id = org_workspace.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
